tools.title: Cooking Tools
tools.description: Everything you need to make cooking easier and more fun!

timer.title: Cooking Timer
timer.description: Multiple timers for perfect cooking every time
timer.startFromPresets: Start a timer from the presets above or create a custom one

shopping.title: Shopping List
shopping.addManually: Add items manually or from your saved recipes

hero.title: Mix & Munch
hero.subtitle: Your AI-powered Filipino recipe and meal planning assistant
hero.description: Discover authentic Filipino recipes, plan your meals, and get personalized cooking guidance powered by advanced AI technology.

pantryAware.title: Pantry-Aware Recipe Suggestions
pantryAware.description: Get personalized recipe recommendations based on ingredients you already have at home.

aiSousChef.title: AI Sous Chef
aiSousChef.description: Your personal cooking assistant that guides you through every step of Filipino cuisine preparation.

chefTranscripts.title: Chef Video Transcripts
chefTranscripts.description: Learn from professional Filipino chefs with detailed video transcripts and cooking techniques.

home.modern_makers_description: Whether you're a seasoned cook or just starting your culinary journey, Mix & Munch provides the tools and guidance you need to create delicious Filipino dishes.

makers.title: Designed for modern Filipino makers
makers.description: Each screen delivers a purpose-built flow: pantry matching, AI cook-along, chef transcript demos, and profile personalization.

recipes.title: Filipino Recipe Collection
recipes.subtitle: Discover authentic Filipino dishes with step-by-step guidance
recipes.description: Explore our curated collection of traditional and modern Filipino recipes, each with detailed instructions and ingredient lists.
recipes.modernTitle: Filipino dishes reimagined for the modern home cook
recipes.modernDescription: Browse our curated set of chef-tested recipes. Each card indicates pantry matches when you hop over from the checklist, and includes attribution for every visual asset.

garlicOnions.title: üßÑ Garlic & Onions
garlicOnions.prompt: I have garlic and onions. What Filipino dishes can I make?

chickenLime.title: üçó Chicken & Lime
chickenLime.prompt: I have chicken and lime. Suggest some Filipino recipes.

surprise.title: üé≤ Surprise Me
surprise.prompt: Surprise me with a delicious Filipino recipe!

chat.introMessage: üëã Kumusta! I'm your AI Filipino recipe assistant. I can help you discover authentic Filipino dishes, suggest recipes based on your ingredients, and guide you through cooking traditional favorites. What would you like to cook today?

saved.title: üíæ Saved Recipes
saved.subtitle: Your collection of favorite recipes
saved.saveInstructions: Click the Save button on any AI-generated recipe
saved.selectRecipe: Select a recipe from the list to view details
saved.select_recipe: Select a recipe to view details and cooking instructions

youtubeCrawler.title: YouTube Recipe Crawler
youtubeCrawler.description: Extract ingredients from YouTube cooking videos and manage content creators

analytics.title: Analytics Dashboard
analytics.description: Insights and statistics from your ingredient extraction activities
analytics.startProcessing: Start processing YouTube videos to see analytics and insights.

settings.title: Settings
settings.description: Configure your YouTube crawling preferences and system behavior

saved_recipes.title: Your Recipe Collection
saved_recipes.subtitle: All your saved culinary creations in one place
saved_recipes.no_recipes_description: Start building your collection by saving recipes from our AI assistant or browsing our curated collection.

youtube_crawler.title: YouTube Recipe Crawler
youtube_crawler.subtitle: Extract ingredients and recipes from YouTube cooking videos
youtube_crawler.description: Analyze YouTube cooking videos to automatically extract ingredients, cooking steps, and recipe information using advanced AI technology.

analytics.title: Analytics Dashboard
analytics.description: Track your recipe extraction performance and analyze ingredient patterns from processed YouTube videos.
analytics.no_data_description: Start processing YouTube videos to see analytics and insights about extracted ingredients and recipes.

settings.title: Settings
settings.description: Configure processing options and performance settings for YouTube video analysis.

errorBoundary.title: Something went wrong
errorBoundary.description: We encountered an unexpected error. Please try refreshing the page.

error_boundary.error_description: We encountered an unexpected error. Please try refreshing the page.

footer.copyright: ¬© {{year}} Mix & Munch Studio. Crafted in the Philippines with flavor and code.

about.title: Capstone-grade Filipino culinary lab
about.description: Mix & Munch is an academic portfolio project crafted to demonstrate full-stack product thinking. Every screen is purpose-built for storytelling‚Äîfrom pantry intelligence and AI-driven chat to chef transcript parsing demos.

productPillars.title: Product pillars
productPillars.reduceWaste: Reduce ingredient waste through pantry-first recipe surfacing.
productPillars.celebrateFlavors: Celebrate Filipino flavors with creative AI mentorship using Gemini.
productPillars.showcaseWorkflow: Showcase transcript-to-recipe workflow for chef collaborations.

technologyStack.title: Technology stack
technologyStack.nextjs: Next.js App Router + TypeScript for cohesive UX flows.
technologyStack.tailwind: Tailwind CSS with custom dark theme and micro-interactions.
technologyStack.gemini: Gemini AI via @ai-sdk/google for conversational intelligence.

pantry.title: What's in your kitchen today?
pantry.description: Toggle ingredients you have on hand to see recipe matches ranked by pantry compatibility and ratings.
pantry.noResults: No ingredients found matching your search criteria.
pantry.recipeMatchesDescription: Showing {{count}} dishes ranked by pantry match and rating.

profile.title: Tune Mix & Munch to your taste buds
profile.description: Save pantry staples, dietary goals, and notification cadence. These settings personalize AI chat prompts and recipe ordering across the experience.

youtubeDemo.title: Watch how we translate chef storytelling into structured recipes
youtubeDemo.description: Search for cooking videos and see how our pipeline processes real YouTube content into structured recipe data.
youtubeDemo.pipelineNote1: Videos are fetched live from YouTube Data API v3
youtubeDemo.pipelineNote2: Transcript processing is simulated (YouTube API doesn't provide transcripts)
youtubeDemo.pipelineNote3: Recipe extraction uses AI-powered content analysis
youtubeDemo.pipelineNote4: Results feed into Mix & Munch recipe models for review
youtubeDemo.networkError: Network error occurred while searching videos
